question: A friend of yours is thinking about applying for the same course that you did at university. He/she has asked for your advice about studying this subject.Write a letter to your friend. In your letter,give details of the course you took at the universityexplain why you recommend the universitygive some advice about how to applyWrite at least 150 words.
text: Hello! I hope you're in good health. Thank you for choosing me to suggest the subjects you can choose for your course which I had chosen.

Although, there are several subjects that might interest you, however, I decided to go on with finance and accounts. In that specific subject, I had learned plenty of things about how to generate invoices and match balance sheets. Most employers looking for people who have knowledge related to this.

Moreover, the reason behind recommending this college is that you will get a lot of students benefits such as meals, hostel facilities, and so on. Also, the teachers have distinguished according to their specializations in particular subjects.
So, the easiest way to apply for admission is to go with the university website. There is also an option of getting admitted into college by visiting directly to the window no. 2.
Let me know if you want any more details.
